Description.Text:
The aparthotel NH La Florida is located in a strategic zone of Madrid,at only 10 km from the city center; with great facility of connection with the principal road links: National VI and M-40, near the railway station El Barrial and with a bus stop at only 2 mins. Placed to a few minutes of the malls Sixth Avenue and El Corte Ingles, with a great variety of shops and establishments dedicated to the restoration and the leisure. The hotel is 10 minutes away by car to the El Club de Campo Villa of Madrid, 5 minutes away to La Zarzuela hospital and 9km away to the hospital Puerta de Hierro of Mahadahonda.
Our 41 comfortably appointed rooms are equipped with all amenities you might need such as private bathroom with hair dryer and toiletries, direct dial phone, satellite TV, working space, central air conditioning and kitchenette.
FREE WIFI in Lobby & Rooms

Standard - Twin - Standard Twin offers two twin beds. Comfortable and welcoming rooms are equipped with everything needed to make you feel at home, digital TV, free internet access wi-fi, refrigerator, kitchenette, sofa, cooking utensils and air conditioning.
Standard - Double - Standard Double offers one queen bed. Comfortable and welcoming rooms are equipped with everything needed to make you feel at home, digital TV, free internet access wi-fi, refrigerator, kitchenette, sofa, cooking utensils, air conditioning.
Superior - Twin - Superior Twin offers three twin beds. Superior rooms consist of a wider, more comfortable, with separate lounge, kitchen, bathroom with bath, and bedroom with either double bed or two beds.Rooms are equipped with a large desk and chair, lounge chair, sofa and armchairs, Satellite TV, a mini-bar, free LAN and wireless Internet access, and individually controlled air conditioning.
Superior - Double - Superior Double offers one double bed and one twin bed and one sofa bed. Superior rooms consist of a wider, more comfortable, with separate lounge, kitchen, bathroom with bath, and bedroom with either double bed or two beds.Rooms are equipped with a large desk and chair, lounge chair, sofa and armchairs, Satellite TV, a mini-bar, free LAN and wireless Internet access, and individually controlled air conditioning.
Family - Suite - Family Suite offers bedding varies and one twin bed and one sofa bed. Family rooms consist of a wider, more comfortable, with separate lounge, kitchen, two bathroom with bath, and two bedroom with either double bed or two beds.Rooms are equipped with a large desk and chair, lounge chair, sofa and armchairs, Satellite TV, a mini-bar, free LAN and wireless Internet access, and individually controlled air conditioning.
